I wonder who likes NTR. Maybe it's the sadists/rape fantasizers who identify with the taker. But also, it's the broken people who've experienced this sort of thing in real life. I keep coming back to it and I don't know why. Maybe it's to relive the trauma. Maybe I want to justify my loss of trust. Maybe I'm corrupted now too. The human brain is such a confusing thing. Why would I indulge in something I used to hate so much? And it's not like I stopped functioning. I feel hatred and pain, but it really doesn't last very long anymore. I'm cautious, but I still believe in love. I'm still outwardly confident in real life. And yet when I lay in bed at night I still wonder: "why?" I understand now that she's a terrible, lustful person, but the love was once so pure. I guess there was a red flag at the start when I gradually saw how bad she was at communicating anything, when I noticed how differently we were evolving as people. I hate NTR, but it's too real for me not to understand.
